attributes.action: Align our clocks with Central European Time
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: This will give an extra hour of daylight every evening with consequent energy savings, and benefit business communication with the rest of europe.

government_responses.details:
You signed a petition asking the Prime Minister to "Align our clocks with Central European Time."

The Prime Minister's Office has responded to that petition and you can view it here: 

http://www.pm.gov.uk/output/Page14560.asp

Prime Minister's Office
